original_text: And Hezekiah welcomed them gladly. And he showed them his treasure house, the silver, the gold, the spices, the precious oil, his whole armory, all that was found in his storehouses. There was nothing in his house or in all his realm that Hezekiah did not show them.
korean_text: 히스기야가 사자들로 말미암아 기뻐하여 그들에게 보물 창고 곧 은금과 향료와 보배로운 기름과 모든 무기고에 있는 것을 다 보여 주었으니 히스기야가 궁중의 소유와 전 국내의 소유를 보이지 아니한 것이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: And he showed them his treasure house,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들에게 자신의 보물고를 보여주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: the silver, the gold, the spices,
the precious oil, his whole armory,
all that was found in his storehouses.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 창고에서 발견된 모든 것을 보여주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: There was nothing in his house
that Hezekiah did not show them.
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야가 그들에게 보여주지 않은 것이 없었습니다.
